完成任务“尘沙的回声”: Complete Quest: Whispers of the Sands
完成任务“生存之道”: Complete Quest: The Art of Survival
完成任务“门后的秘密”: Complete Quest: The Secret Behind the Door
完成任务“乘着轻柔的风”: Complete Quest: On a Gentle Breeze
完成任务“审判日”: Complete the quest "On the Judgment Day"
见证一位卡戎……或者是每一位卡戎的命运。: Witness the fate of a Charon… or perhaps every Charon.
转啊转啊，回忆如灯上走马。: As the carousel of time spins, echoes ride phantom steeds.
在格雷姆废矿中为后来者点起一盏灯。: Leave a light in Glevum Pit for those who follow.
“如果我不能像人一样活着，请让我像人一样死去。”: If I can't live like a person, then at least let me die like one.
这张相片曾记得你的名字我的声音。: This photo cradles the echo of your name, the shadow of my voice.
逆水行舟，直至回到往昔岁月。: Row against the current, borne back to bygone days.
“我来带你回家。”: I'm here to take you home.
利用过载的月髓舱炸毁动力室。: Overload the Phoxichor Tanks to destroy the engine room.
使用炮台打开通向中央控制室的通路。: Use the turrets to blast open a path to the Central Control Room.
永远不要说“等战争结束我就去做某件事”。: Never tempt fate by saying, "I'll do it once the war is over."
“如果遮风挡雨的伞小到只能庇护一人，请让我们一起走入雨里。”: If there's only room for one under the brolly, I'll brave the rain with you all.
自炼火的囚笼中涅槃。: Reborn from the cage of a raging inferno.
完成支线任务“不似木樨归处”: Complete Side Quest: Where the Osmanthus Bloomed
完成任务“致无名者的安魂曲”: Complete the quest "Requiem for the Nameless"
成功推理出卡戎狩猎凶手可能的藏身之处。: Deduce the likely hideout of the killer in the Charon Hunt case.
直面曾经伤害你的怪物。: Confront the monsters that once wounded you.
“我不会再看着任何人被秽兽杀死。”: "I'll never let anyone die to Filthoids again."
成功为雾区居民钓上大鱼。: Land a big fish for the residents of Mist Aken.
我们生活在沟渠里，但仍有人仰望星空。: We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars.
我设想过很多次我们的重逢，但唯独不是以这种方式。: I pictured our reunion countless times — but never like this.
撕碎囚笼吧，纵使只剩残损的手掌。: Tear the cage apart — even if it leaves your hands in tatters.
“致我生命中仅此一次的成功演出。”: "To the only successful performance of my life."
累计寻觅20次: Make a total of 20 Weave pulls
累计寻觅50次: Make a total of 50 Weave pulls
累计寻觅100次: Make a total of 100 Weave pulls
